title: Troian Bellisario finally reveals name of her baby girl a year after her birth ...and it's Aurora
text:
It's been a year since Troian Bellisario and Patrick J Adam welcomed their baby daughter.

Now Troian has publicly revealed their little one's name for the first time, with the toddler going by the moniker Aurora.

The Pretty Little Liars star announced the name almost as an aside as she looked at jars of baby food on her kitchen counter in an video she posted on her Instagram stories on Sunday.

She's called Aurora: Troian Bellisario has finally revealed the name of the baby daughter she shares with husband Patrick J. Adam nearly a year after her birth

Troian lingered over the enticing contents of the bottles.

And the 33-year-old mused: 'Wooo... I'm trying to figure out which of these I'm gonna give Aurora for dinner.'

There was no sign of Troian, or Aurora, as the actress stayed behind the camera.

It's not just their daughter's name that Troian and her Suits star husband Patrick, 38, have kept under wraps.

Proud parents to be: Troian's baby bump barely showed when she and husband Patrick joined guests at Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's wedding at Windsor Castle in May 2018

They have shared few social media snaps of their little girl although photographers caught pictures of Troian pushing her baby girl in a stroller and carrying the tot in New York in August.

Troian and Patrick met on the set of the play Equivocation in 2009.

The couple briefly split, but got back together after his guest appearance in Pretty Little Liars in 2010.

They tied the knot on December 10, 2016 in Santa Barbara, two hours north of Los Angeles.

Getting personal: The 33-year-old shared her breast-feeding experiences on Instagram - but still didn't reveal her daughter's name

Yummy chow: Troian revealed her daughter's name almost as an aside as she looked at GoMethodology baby food on her kitchen counter in an Instagram video she posted on Sunday

Meanwhile Troian has barely stopped working after Aurora's birth.

She can next be seen in Chuck Hank And The San Diego Twins, presently in post production, which has yet to set a release date.

Patrick has wrapped Suits after eight years and is presently prepping TV series The Right Stuff, about the pilots chosen to train as astronauts in the 1950s and 1960s,

He plays John Glenn who becomes the first man in orbit.
description: The Pretty Little Liars star, 33, did it almost as an aside as she looked at all the jars of GoMethodology baby food on her kitchen counter in a yummy Instagram video she posted on Sunday.
